mapper.select: SELECT xm.DJJG, xm.SLBH, xm.XMID, xm.DJSJ, xm.DBR, '' as FJ, xm.QSZT, xm.BZ, fwzl.QLID, fwzl.ZXFWZLYWH, fwzl.ZXFWZLDJSJ, fwzl.ZXFWZLDBR, fwzl.ZXFWZLYY, fwzl.ZLQSSJ, fwzl.ZLJSSJ, xm.DJLX, xm.DJYY, fwzl.QLLX, fwzl.GYQK, fwzl.ZLXYSDSJ, fwzl.ZLBW, fwzl.ZLFS, fwzl.ZLLX, fwzl.YZJ, fwzl.FWZLBAZMH from bdc_xm xm Inner Join BDC_CSH_FWKG_SL BCF on xm.XMID = BCF.ID Inner JOIN BDC_XM_LSGX lsgs on xm.XMID = lsgs.XMID AND lsgs.wlxm = 0 Inner JOIN BDC_FWZL fwzl on lsgs.YXMID = fwzl.XMID where BCF.SFSCQL = '0' and BCF.SFZXYQL = '1' AND xm.qszt = '2' AND xm.bdcdyh = #{bdcdyh}
